Package hac.Filters

Class CartInterceptor

java.lang.Object
hac.Filters.CartInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor
@Component public class CartInterceptor extends Object implements org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor
Interceptor to prevent access to /checkout when the cart is empty.

  • Method Details

    • preHandle

      public boolean preHandle(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception
      Pre-handle method to check if the cart is empty before allowing access to /checkout.
      Specified by:
      preHandle in interface org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor
      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request
      response - the HTTP response
      handler - the handler for the request
      Returns:
      true if the cart is not empty and further processing should continue, false otherwise, and redirects the user to /cart
      Throws:
      Exception - in case of any error during handling the request
